name: Kubernetes Cluster with Strongloop 3 Tier Deployment
description: Kubernetes - An orchestration system for containerized applications, e.g., Strongloop.

metadata.displayName: Kubernetes Cluster with Strongloop 3 Tier Deployment
metadata.longDescription: Deploys a Kubernetes Cluster in VMware, where Kubernetes is an open-source system for automating deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications. This deployment also deploys the Strongloop sample application to validate the deployment is operational, where Strongloop/Loopback framework and best practices SW (Node.js, Angular.js, MongoDB) are used for a quick web development.

bullets.title: Topology
bullets.description:
VMWare: 2+ virtual machines:
  • - 1 Kubernetes Master;
  • - 1+ Kubernetes Minions, with the following software installed (their distribution is determined by Kubernetes)
    • 1 Kubernetes Dashboard container
    • 1 MongoDB container
    • 1+ Strongloop/Node.js containers
    • 1+ Angular.js/Express.js/Node.js containers

bullets.title: Software deployed
bullets.description:
1. Kubernetes:an open-source system for automating deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications
2. MongoDB:a NoSQL database
3. Strongloop:a complete solution that addresses all aspects of the API lifecycle, for both on-premises and cloud environments
4. Node.js:an execution environment for event-driven server-side and networking applications
5. Express.js:a web application framework that runs on Node.js
6. Angular.js:a JavaScript MVC framework that runs in browser JavaScript engines

bullets.title: Default virtual machine settings
bullets.description:
• VMware:
    • Flavor:
      • Kubernetes Master:
        • Cores - 2
        • Memory - 4GB
        • Storage - Depends on Image
      • Kubernetes Minions:
        • Cores - 2
        • Memory - 4GB
        • Storage - Depends on Image
    • Network:
      • Private IP:
        • Availability - Customer Provided
        • Ingress - Via VPN
        • Egress - Allows HTTP to all destinations
      • Public IP:
        • Availability - None
    • Firewall:
      • Kubernetes Master:
        • Availability - Not enabled
      • Kubernetes Minions:
        • Availability - Not enabled

bullets.title: Usage and special notes
bullets.description:
• 1. Downloads latest releases of software.
  • 2. To access the application and virtual machines, please see the instructions in the output log.
  • 3. The sample application in this deployment is partially from the open source project https://github.com/strongloop/loopback-example-angular and more details of software can be found in https://kubernetes.io/, https://www.mongodb.com/, https://strongloop.com/, https://nodejs.org/en/, and https://angularjs.org/.
